headline: ACME Corp announces unexpected CFO resignation
body: ACME Corp said its CFO will step down effective immediately due to personal reasons. No change to Q4 guidance mentioned.

headline: RivalTech wins $200m government contract
body: RivalTech secured a 5-year contract with DoD, boosting its backlog. Management expects margin expansion.

headline: ACME faces preliminary antitrust inquiry in EU
body: EU Commission opened an initial look into ACME's pricing in consumer devices. No formal charges yet.
